title: Alps Monogatari: Watashi no Annette
original_name: アルプス物語　わたしのアンネット
opening_song: "Annette no Aoi Sora" by Keiko Han
ending_song: "Edelweiss no Shiroi Hana" by Keiko Han
sinopse: 12-year-old Annette was born into a poor family in Switzerland. Together with her family she lives in a small village in the Alps. She is a sweet girl and dearly loves her little 5-year-old brother Dani, at whose birth their mother died. She also has a best friend, Lucien. Her wonderful friendship with him comes to a crisis when one day Dani gets injured in a terrible accident.
